ActPatent Act
SubjectPatent Rules
PrecisPATENT RULES in order to (1) implement amendments that were made to the Act in order to allow Canada's ratification of the Patent Law Treaty; and, (2) modernize Canada's patent regime by updating, clarifying, codifying and improving aspects of the regulatory framework.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0251 Publication Date: 2019-07-10
